bike.description: Kinesium triple-butted alloy, 130mm travel mp4 suspension, asymmetrical chainstays with 12x142mm dropouts, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, dropper post routing, ISCG05 chainguide mounts, cartridge bearing pivots, Fox Float CTD Factory Series High Volume LV shock w/3-position compression + Trail Adjust, Boost Valve & Kashima coating, 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Rock Shox Maxle axle

components.description: Fox 32 Float 650B FIT CTD Factory Series w/3-position compression, Trail Adjust & Kashima coating,15mm axle, air spring, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 130mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Shimano XT 650B, Tubeless, 15mm front & 12x142mm rear center-lock hubs, straight-pull spokes
Shimano XT Shadow Plus rear and XT dual pull front
Shimano XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes with Ice-Technology pads & 180mm front/160mm rear RT81 Ice-Technology centerlock rotors
Crank Brothers Iodine 2, 720mm x 30mm rise, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep
